name: Sun Escape (NDelbaer)
description:
Desktop & Html5

Please choose desktop for a better rendering.

Sun Escape

Find the stargate and save your mothership from the incoming supernova!

Scavage as many fuel tanks as you can by connecting ("E") the energy links (blue orbs) and bring them back to your mothership.

Then take the control of the big vessel ("E") and start the engine to get closer to the portail. 

In distress? Call the Tractor Beam ("Spacebar") from the mothership to get closer.

Good Luck!

TLDR;

Collect fuel tanks by connecting blue orbs and get the hell out of there !

Credits:

  • Graphics Design: Yufeng Huang
  • Dev: Nicolas Delbaer
